jumping rats

```{r}
my_url="http://ritsokiguess.site/datafiles/jumping.txt"
rats=read_delim(my_url,' ')
```

```{r}
rats
```

my Mood's median test

```{r}
median_test(rats,density,group)
```

RVAideMemoire median test

```{r}
mood.medtest(density~group,data=rats,exact=F)
```


R companion pairwise MMT

```{r}
pairwiseMedianTest(density~group,data=rats)
```

```{r}
pairwiseMedianTest
```
